text: Harry Jeannot Lipkin (June 16, 1921 in New York City âˆ’ September 15, 2015 in Rehovot), also known as Zvi Lipkin,Good News For A Change by Harry (Zvi) Lipkin in Haaretz was an Israeli theoretical physicist. He was known for working in nuclear physics and elementary particle physics. He won the Wigner Medal.University of Texas at Austin ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American physicists Category:Israeli academics Category:Israeli Jews Category:Israeli physicists Category:Jewish academics Category:Jewish American scientists Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Scientists from New York City
